Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • robotos.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Junk, Player, Robot

    public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclase Actor, contiene variables y métodos comunes de todos los jugadores
    Author:
    AudCavalier
